    • models.Model
      • models.ContentCode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ContentCode
extends Model
    Mapping from coded measures to labels. FHIR compatible *

      • getContentForSystemCode

                                                throws InternalServerException
        returns the MIDATA content field value for a system+code pair
        Parameters:
        systemCode - the system plus code pair to be looked up
        Returns:
        the content field value used by MIDATA or null if the code could not be found
